venues.name: Mii amo Spa
venues.review: Set inside Boynton Canyon in the red rock country, Mii amo is one of the best destination spas in the Western hemisphere — and not by a little. The setting is sacred Yavapai land, the treatments draw on Indigenous healing traditions, and the experience of soaking in an outdoor mineral pool with canyon walls on all sides is something you carry with you.
venues.hours: Guests and day visitors · Reservation required

venues.name: The Spa at L'Auberge de Sedona
venues.review: Creekside in the cottonwood trees along Oak Creek, with red rock views from the outdoor pools. The most accessible of Sedona's spa experiences without compromising on quality. The desert heat treatments are designed specifically for this landscape.
